quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: 80s and Andy
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, cosby. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Where in NYC, did the Huxtable family live in the great series from the 80s The Cosby Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brooklyn

questions.question: What was the name of the boy in Toy Story who lived next door to Andy and tortured his toys?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sid Philips

questions.question: Tim Allen agreed to provide the voice of Buzz Lightyear in Toy Story, after Billy Crystal declined the part.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Cherish was a big hit song for this group in 1985.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kool  the Gang

questions.question: What was the nickname of Theos friend Walter Bradley on the hit television show The Cosby Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cockroach

questions.question: What is the name of the arcade/restaurant to which Andy and his family go in the popular 90s movie Toy Story?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pizza Planet

questions.question: At the end of the movie Toy Story, Andy and his sister are opening his Christmas presents and Buzz is worried that he will be replaced by a better toy. What does Andy get for Christmas?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A pet dog

questions.question: In what city was the great 80s sitcom The Cosby Show filmed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York City

questions.question: Was there ever a spin-off series spawned from the 80s television sitcom The Cosby Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Which actress played Denise Huxtable on the 80s sitcom The Cosby Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lisa Bonet

questions.question: In the movie Toy Story, Buzz is taken by Andys next door neighbor Sid. Sids sister Hannah decides to have a tea party with Buzz. What name does she give Buzz while they are playing together?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mrs. Nesbitt

questions.question: At night I wake up with the sheets soaking wet, and a freight train running through the middle of my head is a verse from this 1985 Bruce Springsteen song.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im On Fire

questions.question: What year did Pixars movie Toy Story first come out in the movie theatres in the U.S.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1995

questions.question: What Hollywood actor provided the voice of Sheriff Woody in the hit movie Toy Story?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Hanks

questions.question: What year did the great sitcom from the 80s, The Cosby Show first hit the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1984
